name: Admin in English
author: Nikolay Bachiyski

sections.description: Sometimes we want the front end of our blog to be translated for the users, but keep the backend admin panel in English. Admin in English does just that.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

  1. Unzip admin-in-english--x.x.zip
  2. Upload the admin-in-english directory (not its contents, the whole directory) to /wp-content/plugins/
  3. Activate the plugin through the Plugins menu in WordPress
sections.changelog:
1.2.1

  • Bugfix: prevent possible fatal in WordPress 3.6.1. See https://core.trac.wordpress.org/ticket/25294 for backgroud.

1.2

  • Don’t change the locale of frontend AJAX requests. Props Coen Jacobs.

1.1

  • Include wp-login.php in the list of URL in English.

1.0

  • Initial version.

short_description: Admin in English lets you have your administration panel in English, even if the rest of your blog is translated into another language.
description: Sometimes we want the front end of our blog to be translated for the users, but keep the backend admin panel in English. Admin in English does just that.
